(804, 466) --> (804, 540) --> (918, 540)
(918, 540) --> (910, 540) --> (910, 662)

(834, 686) --> (834, 802) --> (765, 802)
(765, 802) --> (765, 831) --> (705, 831)

(655, 15) --> (790, 15) --> (790, 25)

(514, 227) --> (482, 227) --> (482, 251)
(482, 251) --> (482, 275) --> (431, 275)
(431, 275) --> (431, 310) --> (420, 310)

(107, 141) --> (107, 40) --> (76, 40)
(76, 40) --> (178, 40) --> (178, 1)
(147, 356) --> (53, 356) --> (53, 582)

# total weight of the layout is 596
# reduction is 0.11
